<!-- wp:etch/text {"metadata":{"name":"Text"},"content":"\u003c!-- wp:etch/raw-html {\u0022content\u0022:\u0022n  ndocument.querySelectorAll('read-more').forEach((readMore, index) =\u003e {n    const button = readMore.querySelector('button');n    const content = readMore.querySelector('[data-expandable-content]'); n    n    // Generate a unique ID for the contentn    const contentId = `read-more-content-${index}`;n    content.setAttribute('id', contentId);n    button.setAttribute('aria-controls', contentId);n    button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');nn    function toggleReadMore() {n        const ariaState = button.getAttribute('aria-expanded');n        if (ariaState === 'false') {n            button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'true');n            content.setAttribute('style', '--height: 100%; --overlay-display: none;');n        } else {n            button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');n            content.setAttribute('style', '--overlay-display: block;');n            content.style.height = 'var(--height)';n        }n    }nn    button.addEventListener('click', toggleReadMore);n});nn\u0022,\u0022unsafe\u0022:\u0022true\u0022} --\u003e\n"} /-->
